text: Vidyut is an Indian masculine/feminine given name. The Sanskrit word ' which is a feminine word has several meanings including "shining, glittering", "lightning" and "the dawn". Notable people with this name are: *Vidyut Jammwal (born 1980), Indian film actor *Vidyut Sivaramakrishnan (born 1981), Indian cricketer == References == Category:Indian masculine given names
title: Vidyut (given name)
